snippet.title: Legend of Dungeon Trailer
snippet.description:
Legend of Dungeon 'Nearly Beta' is available for purchase here:
http://robotloveskitty.com/LoD/

Go in alone, or team up to Crawl & Brawl through a beautiful and challenging Rogue inspired Dungeon. You and up to 3 companions are on a hunt for a treasure rumored to lie on the 26th floor of a dark and deadly dungeon. Your quest: get the treasure and make it back alive.

Be sure to give us a vote on Greenlight!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=108895757
